H0.text: Typically, a male moose sheds its antlers how frequently. Every 2 years

H1.text: Typically, a male moose sheds its antlers how frequently. Every 5 years

H2.text: Typically, a male moose sheds its antlers how frequently. Every decade

H3.text: Typically, a male moose sheds its antlers how frequently. Every year

A4.text: Immature bulls may not shed their antlers for the winter, but retain them until the following spring.

A5.text: After the mating season males drop their antlers to conserve energy for the winter.
